name: SparkofInspiration
0:
”Alexa, open Spark of Inspiration”
”Alexa, ask Spark of Inspiration for today's quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spark of inspiration
des: Need a little pick me up for the day? Just ask Alexa for a Spark of Inspiration for a new inspirational quote each day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
